document_data.name: Oraundro Nempeth's
document_data.mainbody: '''Oraundro Nempeth's''' was a shop in [[Khôltar]], [[south Faerûn]], ''circa'' the {{YearlinkName|1372}}.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|76-77}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 59: Khôltar, Part 10, Hungry in Handrornlar, and More}}
document_data.Location: Nempeth's was located on the east side of [[North Way]] near Handrornlar, the northern gate through the walls of Khôltar, the Iron City. It was sandwiched between [[Munsrum's Ready Ladle]] to the north and [[Harhallo's Warmhearth House]] to the south.{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks archive|77-78}}{{Cite web/Elminster Speaks/Part 60: Khôltar, Part 11, A Last Look Around Handrornlar}}
document_data.Structure: This building was made of stone and the shop had a relatively narrow front facing the North Way.
document_data.Services: Oraundro Nempeth's sold various binding [[cord]]s, [[rope]], [[twine]], [[wire]], and a few sizes of [[chain]]. It also carried metal rings used as fasteners and wall-mounts.
